## Description

## Checklist

### Required

- [ ] Plugin has valid `plugin.json` manifest
- [ ] Repository is public
- [ ] README includes installation and usage instructions
- [ ] License file exists (MIT/Apache 2.0 recommended)
- [ ] Added entry to `.claude-plugin/marketplace.json` with `"category": "community"`
- [ ] I have read [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md)

### Security

- [ ] No hardcoded credentials or secrets in plugin code
- [ ] No obfuscated code
- [ ] No hidden telemetry (or telemetry is disclosed in README)
- [ ] No data exfiltration to external servers
- [ ] I am the author/maintainer of this plugin repository

### Quality

- [ ] Plugin serves a clear, documented use case
- [ ] No duplicate functionality with existing marketplace plugins
- [ ] Tested with Claude Code CLI
- [ ] At least one version tag exists (e.g., `v1.0.0`)
